patthana22.28:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.28:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:4.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:5.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:6.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuvippayuttañceva nana ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:7.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:8.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:8.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
